title: bitbollo
author: bitbollo
content: Hi everyone, I want sell 5000 bgl BITGESELL coin at current market rate + 5%.https://coinmarketcap.com/it/currencies/bitgesell/This is a bargain chance to acquire this coin in a OTC trade directly on main chain!Accept payment in BTC LTC ETH ZEC. I will not sent first. Escrow available at buyer expense. Please note that you MUST deal only on forum (first) or you're dealing with a scammer!

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: BUMP! Send your request here or in MP! I will never contact anyone outside of here!!!! (Avoid to get scammed easily...)

No bridge, no fees, etc etc... please note that an halving is arriving in upcoming months, now it's the good time to acquire it at a discounted price.Of course this coin offer a good potential as altcoin. comments.body: From the last post this coin has pumped 33%!  NOW...Halving in less than 24 hours, bargain offer  no DEX required, transaction ON CHAIN with lower fees possible! Send a message in DM or reply here!
